titleStmt.title: Two sermons preached the one at Paules Crosse the eight of Ianuarie 1580. The other, at Christes Churche in London the same day in the after noone: by Iames Bisse maister of Art, and fellowe of Magdalen Colledge in Oxenford.
titleStmt.author: Bisse, James, 1551 or 2-1607.

notesStmt.note: Thomas Dawson's initials appear in title page border; actual printer's name from STC.
This and some other copies are missing a line of text between E8v and F1r, which is given on F3r of STC 3100 as 'The attaynment of the life to come".--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
